properties.Observatio: 200m of this canal has been concreted (W=1.2m, H=1.2m). The remaining section has suffered sever bank erosion. Too much water flows in rainy season. In some places, small amounts of garbage have been dumped into streams.
properties.Descriptio: Dry rubble packing (rubble size over 225mm) boulders locally found/Vegetative cover improving for narrow strips (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Arecanut seedlings at 1.5m spacing in 2 rows, Betel plants VP at 3m spacing in 1 row, Green gram as a cover crop/Miscell

properties.Observatio: Villagers says that although the point where this canal joins the main canal is built of concrete, it is not up to the water flow during the rainy season.

properties.Observatio: Starting from Madolgolla main canal. The total length of canal is 1 Km. Some parts of the canal have been concreted (W=0.45m, H=0.3m). There is still about 0.5m to be concreted. 10 Acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal.

properties.Name of th: Hunugala kelin wattha Mahakekala Canal Anicut
properties.Observatio: The anicut that was built across the mahakekela oya and the irrigation canal that carried that water have been destroyed. This 500m long canal has provided water to 18 acres of paddy fields.
properties.Descriptio: Removing debries and clearing the site/Construction of 1.2 m high Weir across stream excluding abutments and stop planks/Construction of 1.8m high 1:3:6 (40mm) cement concrete Retaining Wall /75mm tk. Stop planks (kumbuk ) with 10mm dia. 2nos. M. S. Iron

properties.Observatio: A canal that starts from Levallon HM1 estate. The total length is about 4Km. About 3 acres of paddy fields are irrigated by this canal. Too much water flows in rainy season.
